title: Is anthropology a good optional? Can anybody share CSE marks, preparation strategy and books list for this optional? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: A2Aanthropology is a pretty good optional to score decent marks!!! coming to CSE Marks i scored 283 (147+136) in CSE 2016  preparation strategy:anthropology paper 1 deals with 1) human evolution2) socio cultural anthropology3) anrhropological thought4) physical anthropology5) applied anthropology anthropology paper 2 deals with: 1)indian anthropology - archeological anthropolgy2) indian social system3) indian village system4)tribal anthropology this is simple view of anthropology paper!!!! try to learn definitions without any hiccups according to authorstry to prepare simple notes/ mindmaps for each topicfinish the syllabus and revision is the main key for anthropology as it is very very volatile subjectrelate current news and events while reading tribal anthroplogy ( for example - vedanta bauxite mining - tribal displacement)see the past 10 years papers, particularly last 5 years papers and know the trend!!! many questions do often repeat in some other formonce u finish the syllabus try to give a test series or start answer writing practiceBOOKS :1) braintree material2) sosin madam notes3) muniratnam printed material4) telugu academy anthropology text books5)physical anthropology Pnath6) indian anthropology nadeem hasnain7) ministry of tribal welfare8) National commission on ST reports
